result.reason: Implementing a debug dump tool will improve support capabilities by standardizing the collection of logs, environment details, and sanitized configuration.
result.approach: Create a `DebugDumper` class in `Tools` to aggregate logs, system info, and version data. Integrate a trigger in `FrmMain` (Help menu) to generate and save this report.
